txt.en: You are skilled at conserving energy and are able to expend less energy when performing certain skills.

#1:[placeholder]: Affects the following skills while utilizing the Riddermark Discipline: #1:{None|Ride By, Keen Strike, Trick: Stratagem, Jollification, Strategic Strike, and All in the Wrist.[G]|Measured Attack, Oppressive Blow, Cry Havoc, Cry Wrath, Rally the Riders, and Rider and Steed.[C]|Mounted Strike, Swift Cut, Sundering Blow, Recuperate, Destabilizing Strike, and Horn Blast.[H]|Driving Slash, Staggering Slash, Serrated Edge, Clash of Arms, Pledge to Rohan, and Rohan's Edge.[U]|Flay Open, Seeking Arrow, Noble Arrow, Spread of Arrows[T]|Metal and Mettle, Enduring Embers, Mearas-lore, Radiant Burst, Bond of the Rider, and Sign of Power: Inspiration.[L]|Hammer of Rohan, Ballad: Saga, Cry of the Eorlingas, Call of the Eorlingas, Anthem of the Riddermark, and Coda of the Eorlingas[I]|Invoke the Elements, Inspirational Verse, Fixation of Storm, Oration of the Bleak Sky, Debate the Land, and Resolution of Storms.[K]|Roar of the Eorlingas, Assault of the Eorlingas, Strike with Power, Clash of Steel and Will, Defence of the Eorlingas, and Skill of the Eorlingas.[W]| Execute, Biting Edge[B]| Momentous Hit and Camaraderie[R]|Quick Strike, Folca's Lsat Stand[O]}
